attributes.additional_details:
It is appalling that the soilders in our country are either losing there jobs due the strategic defense review 2010 or being made to have there benefits or pensions cut.

We have 2 new Queen Elizabeth class aircraft carriers on the way with in realistic terms no planes to actually launch off of them due to the decommissioning of the harrier and other such aircraft.

We need our military if we ever want to achieve the status of great britain again but at the moment we're just ruining our chance by destroying our forces.
